welcome_message_body: Welcome to Fuldatal, Germany! Prepare to be charmed by our quaint town surrounded by picturesque landscapes. Make sure to take some time to explore and immerse yourself in our rich culture and delicious cuisine. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kassel-Calden Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Kassel-Calden Airport, primarily used for charter and private flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Fritzlar Airbase Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Fritzlar Airbase Airport is used for military operations and personnel.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
